options.value: Single Source, Single Storage (eg off the header)
Single Source, Comingled Storage (eg farm silo)
Multi-Vendor Storage (eg grain depot, cotton gin seed storage)
Factory Developed Product (eg ethanol plant, gluten plant)

question2.field: Does this commodity contain restricted animal materials (eg meat and bone meal)?

options.value: Single Source, Single Storage (eg off the header)
Single Source, Comingled Storage (eg farm silo)
Multi-Vendor Storage (eg grain depot, cotton gin seed storage)

question3.field: With respect to Genetically Modified Organisms, this commodity: (tick one)

options.value: Is non GMO as defined by 99% non GMO
Is non GMO as defined by 95% non GMO
Contains greater than 5% GMO or content unknown
